name: HRShield
0:
”Alexa open HR Shield”
”Alexa launch HR Shield”
”Alexa start HR Shield”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: h. r. shield
des:
Do you own a small business? Are you considering starting a business? Does hiring an HR professional not fit your budget and current cash flow?

Whether you are a newly certified HR professional, business owner, office manager, student or a general curious person the HR Shield Alexa Skill provides quick, accurate and simple answers to common HR and business questions.

To use the skill say: 'Alexa open HR Shield' and ask questions like:

'What is employment at will?'

'What is FUTA?'

'What is a LLC?'

'Do I need an employee handbook?'

'Do I have to offer paid sick leave?'

If you ask an HR and business question HR Shield does not yet know, not to worry as we will be notified and we'll 'teach' Alexa the answer so you can stop back later to get your question answered.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
